plot: A trip around the garden, a small boy strolls while heavy and profound ideas flow through his surroundings. A small event triggers philosophical questions, and leaves them with no answer.
title: Volvamos a las cosas mismas
plot_es: A trip around the garden, a small boy strolls while heavy and profound ideas flow through his surroundings. A small event triggers philosophical questions, and leaves them with no answer.
plot_en: A trip around the garden, a small boy strolls while heavy and profound ideas flow through his surroundings. A small event triggers philosophical questions, and leaves them with no answer.
